post:
Hello.

_I created a new thread because the OVHcloud post is about our US brand, which has got differents offerts / products. Reminder, OVH is a different brand from SYS, and we launched it later, thats why I m doing another post. Should be moved to BF section tomorrow._

**https://www.ovh.com/black-friday/**

_You can add /black-friday/to the URL of the website / language of your choice if the redirection from the first link isn't working
https://www.ovh.ie/black-friday/
https://www.ovh.com/world/black-friday/_

From 27th November to 3rd December


**Dedicated servers:**

- All RISE/ Advance / Infrastructure servers : no setup fee
- Rise-BF-1 / Rise-BF-2** (and a surprise soon) : Special servers made for the event. Great deals IMO.
- ADV STOR: STOR1 (20% off) / STOR2 (30% off) on 12/24 months commitment
- SP-32-S (APAC): 50% off on the first month

**VPS:**
- up to 40% off on  SSD VPS / Cloud VPS : 1 year subscription. No recurring

**Public Cloud**
- double your credit up to 500€ 

**Private Cloud**
- SDDC 16 / SDDC 64 try it 2 months. No commitment.

**+ Other product depending on the region
Webhosting / Domains...**
